Quests.Name: Get Your Starter!
Quests.Description: Talk to Jon in Professor Jon's Lab and pick your first Pals!
Quests.InitialDescription: Jon is waiting for you in Professor Jon's Lab to help you choose your starter.
Objectives: Talk to Jon and pick your starter Pals

Quests.Name: Test Your Battle Skills!
Quests.Description: Win your first Pal battle by taming or defeating a wild Pal.
Quests.InitialDescription: Professor Jon wants to see how you handle yourself in a real Pal battle! Win your first Pal battle by taming or defeating a wild Pal.
Objectives: Win a Pal battle (tame or defeat a wild Pal)

Quests.Name: Defeat Youngster Joey!
Quests.Description: Battle Youngster Joey and his Rattata on Route 1.
Quests.InitialDescription: Youngster Joey is looking for a battle!
Objectives: Win a battle against Youngster Joey
